welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ogden, where the stunning mountain views and historic downtown charm await you. Known for its outdoor recreation and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Mangia Mangia
restaurants.description: Mangia Mangia is a italian restaurant located in Spencerport.

restaurants.name: Bad Apples Bistro
restaurants.description: Bad Apples Bistro is a new american restaurant located in Spencerport.

restaurants.name: Texas Bar-B-Q Joint
restaurants.description: Texas Bar-B-Q Joint is a bbq joint located in Spencerport.

restaurants.name: Grandpa Sam's Italian Kitchen
restaurants.description: Grandpa Sam's Italian Kitchen is a italian restaurant located in Spencerport.

restaurants.name: Slayton Place
restaurants.description: Slayton Place is a american restaurant located in Spencerport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brigham City Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is exclusively for private flights and offers a luxurious and private experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for smaller airlines such as Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all international flights and includes a customs and immigration area.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.
